feed.title: Track Awesome Pinned Gists Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: üìå‚ú® A collection of awesome dynamic pinned gists for GitHub

entry.title: Awesome Pinned Gists Updates on Apr 27, 2025
entry.content:
GitHub

  • activity-box (‚≠ê222) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.
    • github-activity-box (‚≠ê3) - A TypeScript rewrite of activity-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and using the GraphQL API to retrieve issues and PRs authored by the specified user.
  • lang-box (‚≠ê56) - Update a pinned gist to contain languages of your recent commits in GitHub
    • recent-languages-box (‚≠ê0) - A TypeScript + Bun rewrite of lang-box that updates a pinned gist with your recent GitHub commit language statistics. It offers improved type safety, customizability, and uses a more scientific approach to sorting languages.
    • github-lang-box (‚≠ê3) - A TypeScript rewrite of lang-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and private repository access.

entry.title: Awesome Pinned Gists Updates on Jan 02, 2023
entry.content:
External Services

  • bilibili-box (‚≠ê18) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest Bilibili videos.
  • blog-box (‚≠ê6) - Update a pinned gist to show your latest dev.to blog post.
  • book-box (‚≠ê21) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest reads from goodreads
  • chess-com-box-py (‚≠ê13) - Update a pinned gist to contain your Chess.com Ratings.
  • Code::Stats (https://codestats.net/)
    • codestats-box (‚≠ê7) - Update a pinned gist to contain your daily Code::Stats.
    • codestats-box-python (‚≠ê10) - A Python implementation of codestats-box. Update a pinned gist to contain your Code::Stats stats.
  • covid-box (‚≠ê11) - Update a gist to contain global or country specific coronavirus stats.
  • douban-box (‚≠ê14) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest user status about books/movies/music from Douban.
  • goodreads-box (‚≠ê26) - Update a pinned gist to show your currently reading books and progress on Goodreads.
  • hitokoto-box (‚≠ê10) - Update a pinned gist to contain a random hitokoto.
  • mal-box (‚≠ê4) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest activity from MyAnimeList.
  • medium-stat-box (‚≠ê39) - Update a pinned gist to show your medium stats and latest articles.
  • movie-box (‚≠ê23) - Update a pinned gist to contain your media center stats from Trakt.tv.
  • neko-box (‚≠ê31) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity from AniList.
  • shodan-exposure-box (‚≠ê4) - Update a pinned gist containing the top used ports as observed by Shodan.
  • Spotify (https://spotify.com/)
    • spotify-box (‚≠ê129) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly top tracks on Spotify.
    • spotify-box (‚≠ê18) - Update a pinned gist to show your weekly/monthly/all-time top Spotify tracks/artists.
    • spotify-gist (‚≠ê7) - Update a pinned gist to contain your monthly top artist on Spotify.
  • stackoverflow-stats-box (‚≠ê1) - Update a pinned gist to show stack overflow stats.
  • strava-box (‚≠ê47) - Update a pinned gist to contain your YTD exercise metrics from Strava.
  • toggl-box (‚≠ê7) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly Toggl time tracking stats
  • typeracer-box (‚≠ê11) - Update a pinned gist to contain your latest TypeRacer races
  • WakaTime (https://wakatime.com/)
    • waka-box (‚≠ê1.4k) - Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly WakaTime stats.
    • waka-box-go (‚≠ê170) - A Golang implementation of waka-box. Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly WakaTime stats.
  • youtube-box (‚≠ê8) - Update a pinned gist to show your latest YouTube videos

GitHub

  • productive-box (‚≠ê522) - Update a pinned gist to contain your most productive hours during the day.
